title: Experience
description: An experience is a collection of content and activities used to deliver a specific experience to users.

@id.description: A unique and persistent identifier for the experience.

xdm:brief.title: Brief
xdm:brief.description: An HTML brief describing the experience.

xdm:startDate.title: Start Date
xdm:startDate.description: The date when the activity becomes valid. Different publishing channels might use the start date in implementation-dependent ways.

xdm:endDate.title: End Date
xdm:endDate.description: The date when the activity expires. Different publishing channels might use the end date in implementation-dependent ways.
